UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that represents a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Indolicidin analogs with broad-spectrum antimicrobial activity and low hemolytic activity
Literature.Author: Smirnova MP, Kolodkin NI, Kolobov AA, Afonin VG, Afonina IV, Stefanenko LI, Shpen VM, Shamova OV

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli ML-35p(MIC50=0.65±0.12µg/ml),Listeria monocytogenes EGD(MIC50=2.25±0.28µg/ml),Candida albicans 820(MIC50=23.6±0.4µg/ml)
